title: Prismacolor Col-Erase Erasable Colored Pencils, 12 Pack
description: Allow your art to evolve as you create vivid illustrations and drawings with Prismacolor Col-Erase Erasable Colored Pencils. The colored pencils are intensely pigmented yet effortlessly erase making it easy to create brilliant impressions that develop as fast as your imagination. Col-Erase pencils feature a hardened, medium point that resists breakage making them perfect for illustrating, animating and coloring books. Bring your art to completion with Prismacolor colored pencils.
